To learn more about Jamf Connect, a Mac authentication and account management solution with a single set of Okta or Microsoft Azure credentials, visit

https://www.jamf.com/products/jamf-connect/

 

For questions about NoMAD or NoMAD Login, visit

https://www.jamf.com/support/nomad/
